answers.answer: As long as you are eating healthful foods too it's fine to indulge every now and then!

As long as your eating proper meals that aren't to unhealthy junk food is still ok, like try to have fruit and veg and lean meat in your diet as well as junk food, also it's a good idea to take pre natal vitamins, so if you are lacking any nutrients baby will get it from the vitamins.. Everything in moderation :)
some Women have gotten a type of pregnancy diabetes. I'm not sure what it's called!!!! but it's a type of diabetes you get when pregnant!
just make sure you are do eat some healthy food.Try a wheat tortilla warm it up on a skillet, put some peanut butter, and bananas on it. I bet you'll love it!
Rebeccaann11 the word you are blanking on is gestational :-) gestational diabetes

Even women that eat perfectly healthy can get gestational diabetes. As long as you get some sort of healthy foods in the baby will be fine. Wi th my first all I ate was junk food. She's perfectly healthy lol

I was put on a "diet" of only healthy foods.  Raw or steamed vegetables.  No fried veggies.  No sweets no fast food. And i have to carefully monitor my sodium intake because of my bad eating habits.  I feel great! But I do miss my fatty hamburgers and fries. Unhealthy eating puts you at risk for Gestational diabetes. Your Baby may be born with low birth weight or having a big baby.  My advice is to eat as healthy as you can but still indulge on your favorite foods in moderation.

I completely agree with liita26! i personally will be eating as healthy as i can, my child has no control of what i give him or her and i'm not gonna make the decision myself to let it get nutrients from junk food and pop and caffeine and etc
I've never had it. I just assumed having the worst type a diet would make you a higher risk what type of diabetes
I HAYE VOICE TEXT ON MY PHONE.Higher risk of that type of Diabetes.Not higher risk of what type
Agree with zim and liita completely. Your baby needs the healthiest diet possible.
No you dont have to have the healthiest diet possible. Its okay to indulge sometimes!

I eat whatever I want and things have been fine thus far! You have to think some women don't even know they are pregnant and eat like crap, do drugs, smoke, and drink and they have healty babies. Hundreds of years ago women didn't know that they were pregnant and gave birth in fields, they didn't eat well and babies were still OK.
Same and agree^^

Several hundred years ago people ate way healthier...there was no fast food or sugary drinks back then. But, I also think its ok to indulge *every now and then* that's why I said healthiest diet possible :)
No they didn't have fast food, but I'm sure they ate raw fish and unpasteurized milk products, which in my opinion are more dangerous then fast food.
Are you trying to make it seem like its ok to crap, to drugs and drink because u do it or because you just wanna argue with people concerned for her babies health
to eat crap* do drugs*

Um no, anyone with any kind of common sense would realize that I was not implying that what so ever. Just stating facts about how people do a lot of harmful stuff and have perfectly healthy babies, why stress about what you eat.

question: So if i eat junk food a lot and drink soda a lot...how much does it affect the baby? What does it do to the baby or my pregnancy? Im just scared. I try to eat as healthy as i can but i just cant help it. I love junk food as well :(
title: just a question. help me please.
